title: Madhura Karachi Song Lyrics Vetrivel Sakthivel
stanzas: <div>Madhura Karachi Song Lyrics Vetrivel Sakthivel

Ye madhura kaarachchi
madhura kaarachchi

ye madhura kaarachchi
madhiyaanam veyilu
vandhudichu.
un chinna iduppula
seppu kudamaaga
neram vandhudichu

naan madhura kaarithaan
unakku yaetha Kaedithaan
en chinna idupenna
moththayum thaaren
maaman unakkuthaan

thaakkuriye thaakkuriye
enna thavila pola
thaakkuriye

thanni enna pookkavachi
nandhavanam aakkuriye
thalaivaa thalaivaa
ena thaangidu thalaivaa

vaigaiyaathu thanniyila
serndhu kulikkavaa
aadhi mudhal andham varai
paadam padikkavaaa

vaigaiyaathu thanniyila
serndhu kulikkalaam
aadhi mudhal andham varai
paadam padikkalaam

ye madhura kaarachchi
madhiyaanam veyilu
vandhudichu.
un chinna iduppula
seppu kudamaaga
neram vandhudichu

Soodaa vandha vethala
pola thala thalanu
nikkuriye
kaangaeyam kaalai pola
orakkannil paakkuriye

alagar malai uchchiyila
minnal vettudhu vettudhu
kittavaadi
kittavandha pathikkuven
ettaadha ettaadha
oththipoyaa

nee ettipoiyitta
pulla illadi
pulla illanaa
sollu kaelandi

sollu kaela vendaam
mallu kattu maamaa
moththayum thaaren
pichchi thinnu maamaa

Ye madhura kaarachi..
naan madhura kaarithan..

un nenappu un nenappu
yen sindhana pooraam
un nenappu.
kan moodi kan thirandhaa
ellaa kadhilum
un sirippu.

hey kannukutti chellakutti
nee erumbu thingura
vellakkatti

sorgathukku poga
nee vazhiya kaattu
chinnakutti

chinna chinnathaai
muththa kuviyal
penmai sindhuthe
vanna thiraiyil

uchchakkattamaaga
kattukiduvomaa
ippa adhu venaam
oththi vaiyyi maama

ye madhura kaarachchi
madhiyaanam veyilu
vandhudichu.
un chinna iduppula
seppu kudamaaga
neram vandhudichu

naan madhura kaarithaan
unakku yaetha Kaedithaan
en chinna idupenna
moththayum thaaren
maaman unakkuthaan

thaakkuriye thaakkuriye
enna thavila pola
thaakkuriye

thanni enna pookkavachi
nandhavanam aakkuriye
thalaivaa thalaivaa
ena thaangidu thalaivaa

vaigaiyaathu thanniyila
serndhu kulikkavaa
aadhi mudhal andham varai
paadam padikkavaaa

vaigaiyaathu thanniyila
serndhu kulikkalaam
aadhi mudhal andham varai
paadam padikkalaam

Ye madhura kaarachchi
madhura kaarachchi
